description: A test file for the HelloWorld Vue component, using Vitest testing framework to verify rendering behavior.

methods.name: it
methods.description: Defines a test case for checking if the HelloWorld component renders properly.

methods.name: expect
methods.description: Assertion method to verify that the component's output contains the expected text.

ctags.name: wrapper
ctags.pattern: /^    const wrapper = mount(HelloWorld, { props: { msg: 'Hello Vitest' } })$/
